display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used or with arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation used or with arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with >= 3% desaturation or arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hremba4 +hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 +carba4+ caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 + oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 + marbpa4 + maropa4 + manrbpa4 + manropa4) / slpprdp
